group_1.narration: “Yeah, speaking of Juri back then,@at one point she lost to me and my senpai,@and that’s why she was working together@with us in Torayamachi…”
“It's sort of hard to believe when I think back,@having a stronger impression of Juri as@Ryuugasaki’s leader.”
“Back then,@the resentment I built up at school and the stress@I felt in our group, I took it all out on Kyuubey,@along with you guys.”
“For Sis and Sakuya,@they mighta been doing it to cut off the root@of all evil that created Magical Girls.”
“But the Juri the Great of those days@didn’t give a damn about such noble causes;@all I wanted to do was to take out my@ever-buildin’ pissed-offness on Kyubey.”
“However,@it wasn't just our efforts that changed things—@Juri's venting also made a great difference.”
“In return, Juri the Great grew unstable.”

group_1.textLeft: No matter how many times I have tried to explain,@it appears that you still do not understand.
I would prefer you to stop attacking me if possible.

group_1.textRight: Look, it's not your place to argue about@the limited number of individuals.
All we are asking for is for you@to stop recruiting Magical Girls.
We’re done with having lives mistreated@because of your sweet talk.

group_1.textLeft: I don't think it can be called mistreatment when@you are getting one wish for anything you want.

group_1.textRight: We can't just smile sweetly and say you are right,@you know.
Indeed. Your logic is never going to work on us, understand?

group_1.textLeft: …All right, then.
I'm going to stay out of this city@until things settle down.
Because, without your approval,@it is impossible for me to make any contracts.

group_1.textRight: At the time, I thought Kyubey was just bluffing,
but looks like he's gone for real now.

group_1.textLeft: …What about the rest of you?
I don't see that thing around here anymore, either.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, he’s truly vanished.@Feels like I've been living a lie…

group_1.textLeft: However, the number of Witches@has also decreased…
You don’t think there could be a connection…?

group_1.textRight: It's a given that we’re all gonna end up as Witches.
Obviously there'd be fewer of them without@those pissant Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: I understand why you don’t want to believe@that we’ll become Witches one day.
But Juri’s right,@it’s bound to happen eventually.
For now, we had best decide promptly how@to deal with the Grief Seed problem.

group_1.textRight: Unless we want a war on our hands.

group_1.textLeft: Precisely.

group_1.textRight: Well then, I’ll catch ya later.
And for the Grief Seed stuff…@Uhh, Yuna, you handle that, 'kay?

group_1.textLeft: Certainly.@I'll put the question to Sakuya and the rest.

group_1.textRight: That went… smoother than I thought.@Are you not concerned how things will turn out?

group_1.textLeft: I just trust Yuna and them, is all.
She's way better at getting her point across@than me, dontcha think?

group_1.textRight: Ah. For a moment, I thought you simply@didn't need Grief Seeds at all…

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I fucking wish, you dumbass.
And hey, I kinda got other stuff to worry about.
Nothing you need to know about.
